org.resthub.identity.service

Interface UserService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericService<User,Long>, TracableService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
extends GenericService<User,Long>, TracableService
    User services interface.
    Author:
    Guillaume Zurbach

      • getUserPermissions

        List<String> getUserPermissions(String login)
        gets the User's inherited Permissions
        Parameters:
        login - the login of the user
        Returns:
        permissions of the user. In this implementation inherited permissions from group to which the user belong are taken into accounts

        Returns:
